abilities.name: Organic Deconstruction
abilities.description: Innate: Vel'Koz's abilities apply a Deconstruction stack for 7 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Basic attacks refresh the duration on-hit.
descriptions: Innate: Vel'Koz's abilities apply a Deconstruction stack for 7 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Basic attacks refresh the duration on-hit.
The third stack consumes them all, dealing 33 − 169 (based on level) (+ 50% AP)  bonus true damage.

abilities.name: Plasma Fission
abilities.description: Active: Vel'Koz fires a plasma bolt in the target direction that collides with the first enemy hit to deal them magic damage and  slow them by 70% for a few seconds, decaying over the duration. Plasma Fission can be recast after 0.25 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Vel'Koz fires a plasma bolt in the target direction that collides with the first enemy hit to deal them magic damage and  slow them by 70% for a few seconds, decaying over the duration. Plasma Fission can be recast after 0.25 seconds.

At the end of its range or upon colliding with an enemy, the bolt splits in half, each part firing in opposite directions perpendicular to the primary bolt's trajectory, both dealing the same damage and applying the same  slow to the first enemy they collide with.
Recast: Vel'Koz splits Plasma Fission early.
Plasma Fission restores  mana per target killed.

abilities.name: Void Rift
abilities.description: Passive: Vel'Koz periodically stocks a Void Rift charge, up to a maximum of 2.
levelings: Detonation Magic Damage:»45 / 75 / 105 / 135 / 165 (+ 25% AP)«Total Damage:75 / 125 / 175 / 225 / 275 (+ 40% AP)
descriptions: Passive: Vel'Koz periodically stocks a Void Rift charge, up to a maximum of 2.
Active: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that cuts through the ground in a line in the target direction over 1 second, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and leaving behind a trail.
After 0.75 seconds, the trail detonates, dealing magic damage to enemies within.

abilities.name: Tectonic Disruption
abilities.description: Active: Vel'Koz hurls a disruptive anomaly that reaches the target location after 0.75 seconds, briefly providing  sight, dealing magic damage and  knocking up and  stunning enemies in the area for 0.75 seconds. If the area is created close to Vel'Koz, enemies hit are also slightly  knocked back in the direction of the cast.
descriptions: Active: Vel'Koz hurls a disruptive anomaly that reaches the target location after 0.75 seconds, briefly providing  sight, dealing magic damage and  knocking up and  stunning enemies in the area for 0.75 seconds. If the area is created close to Vel'Koz, enemies hit are also slightly  knocked back in the direction of the cast.

abilities.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
abilities.description: Passive - Researched:  Deconstructing enemy champions marks them as  Researched for 7 seconds. Basic attacks on-hit and ability hits refresh the duration.
abilities.damageType: Magic / True
descriptions: Passive - Researched:  Deconstructing enemy champions marks them as  Researched for 7 seconds. Basic attacks on-hit and ability hits refresh the duration.

Active: After a 0.2-second delay, Vel'Koz  reveals himself and  channels for 2.6 seconds to project an energy beam in a line. The ray's trajectory updates itself over the duration to face the target direction. After 1 second, Life Form Disintegration Ray can be recast.

The ray deals magic damage to enemies within in 0.2-second intervals, and  slows them by 20%, lingering for 1 second.  Deconstruction is applied every 0.7 seconds to enemies hit.  Researched enemies take true damage instead.
Recast: Vel'Koz ends Life Form Disintegration Ray early.

name: Vel'Koz
title: the Eye of the Void
blurb: It is unclear if Vel'Koz was the first Void-spawn to emerge on Runeterra, but there has certainly never been another to match his level of cruel, calculating sentience. While his kin devour or defile everything around them, he seeks instead to...
